thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Friday, 12 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-SMS Kredyt Holding Unit Applies For Bank License In Lithuania

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-SMS Kredyt Holding Unit Applies For Bank License In Lithuania

organizations.name: kredyt holding unit applies for bank license in lithuania

text:
Jan 12 (Reuters) - SMS KREDYT HOLDING SA:
* ITS UNIT APPLIES FOR SPECIALISED BANK LICENSE IN LITHUANIA TO START BANKING ACTIVITY
* APPLICATION FOR BANK LICENSE IN LITHUANIA TO BE CONDUCTED IN YEARS 2018-2019
* ESTIMATES COSTS OF FIRST STAGE OF APPLICATION AT NOT MORE THAN 100,000 EUROS
* TOTAL COST OF APPLICATION PROJECT TO BE DEFINED BASING ON SCALE OF INVESTORS INTEREST Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
